tech_news.title: Gemini 3 Flash is here, bringing a ‘huge’ upgrade to the Gemini app - The Verge
tech_news.description: Google is launching Gemini 3 Flash, a more efficient version of its flagship AI model. Gemini 3 Flash will replace the default AI model in the Gemini app and Google’s AI Mode.

tech_news.title: Google’s vibe-coding tool Opal comes to Gemini - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: The company on Wednesday said it is integrating the tool, which lets you build AI-powered mini apps, inside the Gemini web app, allowing users to create their own custom apps.

tech_news.title: "Creative efforts are unpredictable" - Deus Ex designer and former Arkane studio director reflects on its closure after Redfall's disastrous launch - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Arkane Studios' Harvey Smith has reflected on Microsoft's closure of the studio last year, describing it as "a shock" after its run of successes.

tech_news.title: OnePlus 15R review: unbeatable battery life, beatable value - The Verge
tech_news.description: The 15R can go days on a single charge, but its lackluster camera and comparatively high $699 price make it hard to recommend.
